## Report Issue

Note: Please update ComfyUI first ([guide](https://docs.comfy.org/zh-CN/installation/update_comfyui)) and prepare required models. Desktop/Cloud ship stable builds; nightly-supported models may not be included yet, please wait for the next stable release.

- Cannot run / runtime errors: [ComfyUI/issues](https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI/issues)
- UI / frontend issues: [ComfyUI_frontend/issues](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/ComfyUI_frontend/issues)
- Workflow issues: [workflow_templates/issues](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/workflow_templates/issues)

nodes.title: Sampler Setting
widgets_values:
| Parameter | Inference Script (Default) | ComfyUI (Default) |
 |-----------|---------------------------|-------------------|
 | **Steps** | 50 | 20 |
 | **CFG** | 4.0 | 6.0 |
> ðŸ’¡ **Tip:** For better quality results, consider using **50 steps** instead of the default 20  steps in ComfyUI.

A vibrant, sunny video scene: a young man and woman sitting on a green bench on a tennis court, taking a selfie with a white smartphone. The camera starts at a low angle and slowly tilts upward, revealing the clear blue sky. The man wears a light green jacket and shorts, the woman wears a light green blazer and trousers with a red and white striped turtleneck. The woman raises one arm playfully, and they hold hands, radiating youthful energy. The overall style is bright, cinematic, with smooth, slow camera movement and warm, vivid color grading.

nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Negative Prompt)
widgets_values: blurry, low quality, distorted, ugly, watermark, text
